targets.expr: sum by (client) (count_over_time({filename="/var/log/nginx/error.log"} |= "ModSecurity" |= "error" | pattern "<date> <time> [<level>] <_> ModSecurity: <modsec_action> [file \"/etc/modsecurity.d/owasp-crs/rules/<rule_set>.conf<_> [id \"<rule_id>\"<_> [msg \"<msg>\"] <_>[ver \"<owasp_version>\"]<_>] [tag <tags>] [host<_>, client: <client>, server: <server>, request: \"<request_method> <ressource> <http_version>\", <_>" |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

{filename="/var/log/nginx/error.log"} |= "ModSecurity" |= "error" | pattern "<date> <time> [<level>] <_> ModSecurity: <modsec_action> [file \"/etc/modsecurity.d/owasp-crs/rules/<rule_set>.conf<_> [id \"<rule_id>\"<_> [msg \"<msg>\"] <_>[ver \"<owasp_version>\"]<_>] [tag <tags>] [host<_>, client: <client>, server: <server>, request: \"<request_method> <ressource> <http_version>\", <_>"

| line_format " {{.date}} {{.time}} {{.server}} {{.request_method}} {{.ressource}} ❗️☠️ {{.client}} ☠️️❗️ \n➡️ RuleSet: {{.rule_set}} RuleId: {{.rule_id}} {{.msg}}\n [tag {{.tags}}]"

sum by (ressource) (count_over_time({filename="/var/log/nginx/error.log"} |= "ModSecurity" |= "error" | pattern "<date> <time> [<level>] <_> ModSecurity: <modsec_action> [file \"/etc/modsecurity.d/owasp-crs/rules/<rule_set>.conf<_> [id \"<rule_id>\"<_> [msg \"<msg>\"] <_>[ver \"<owasp_version>\"]<_>] [tag <tags>] [host<_>, client: <client>, server: <server>, request: \"<request_method> <ressource> <http_version>\", <_>" |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
